pages.text: A taglock kit is used to collect taglocks from creatures or rivals. Taglocks are used to create a link between target and witchcraft.

To collect taglocks, simply left click the kit on a being. One can also obtain a taglock by right-clicking it on a bed that's been used by a beings like yourself. For some reason, you can't obtain Villager taglocks this way.
Be warn! While tagging a creature is a simple matter, tagging a fellow being like yourself requires a more sneaky approach, as they can notice your failed attempt!
